item.title: Housing Density in US Cities
item.description: Inspired by Cities Start to Question an American Ideal: A House With a Yard on Every Lot. Import data First, lets import our packages. library(tidyverse) library(sf) library(geojsonsf) library(rgdal) library(dplyr) library(rasterVis) library(janitor) library(showtext) Next, lets import our data. read_sf() is super useful here, because it will read in an sf object from a link to the spatial file we want. In this case, the link comes from each cityâ€™s open data portal
